attributes.action: Ban the Short Selling of Shares
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The short selling of shares can cause major losses to small shareholders many of whom may be pensioners or company employees, and those saving for retirement.

Short selling allows rich individuals to profit at the expense of the small shareholder.

It is a "CON" akin to the man selling London Bridge to American Tourists.  He does not own it and therefore cannot sell it.

It should be a condition of Company Law that a purchaser of shares in a Company must hold them for a minimum of 12 months.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
